html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-03182024-04-12PS, CBSA
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Protection of Passenger Information Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROTECTION OF PASSENGER INFORMATION REGULATIONS in order to allow the Canada Border Services Agency(CBSA) to address the lack of clarity and inconsistencies in the regulatory text by changing the term “information” to “passenger name record information”; and regarding the conditions under which the CBSA may disclose passenger name record information to a foreign government authority.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0065 Publication Date: 2024-04-24
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the PROTECTION OF PASSENGER INFORMATION REGULATIONS in order to allow the Canada Border Services Agency(CBSA) to address the lack of clarity and inconsistencies in the regulatory text by changing the term “information” to “passenger name record information”; and regarding the conditions under which the CBSA may disclose passenger name record information to a foreign government authority.
